steps.expected: Article deleted with all related data (comments, likes, subscriptions) removed

issues: Cannot test cascading deletes - article detail pages are inaccessible

observations: Code review confirms ArticleController.Delete() properly handles cascading deletes: removes notifications, revisions (summary and content), comments, journal entries, scoring actions, subscriptions, and the article itself
Code review confirms NO restore functionality exists in the codebase - deleted articles are permanently removed with all related data
The delete functionality is triggered via ContentController.DeletePage() API endpoint which requires authentication and ValidateAntiForgeryToken
NotificationServiceController.DeleteArticle() provides an alternative delete path from notifications for pending articles
CRITICAL BUG: All article detail page URLs return 404 errors despite articles being listed correctly in the Wiki list view
CRITICAL BUG: Create article form Publish button does not submit the form - new articles cannot be created
